entities.name: newspaper
entities.description: The newspaper is mentioned as a source that reported on the situation, but its name is not specified.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as having little effect on one of the most heavily guarded individuals in the place. They are described as being outside his door day and night.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is mentioned as asking what she thinks he's broken out to do, implying that she is concerned about the situation.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being evasive and saying that it's possible that Black's eventual plan is to rejoin You-Know-Who.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as someone who has broken out, but his name is not specified until later in the conversation.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as being alone and friendless, but with Black's return, he will rise again quickly.

entities.name: cornelius
entities.description: Cornelius is mentioned as someone who is dining with the headmaster, and Professor McGonagall suggests that they should head back up to the castle.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as suggesting that Cornelius and she should head back up to the castle.

relationships.description: Fudge mentions that Black's eventual plan is to rejoin You-Know-Who.
Fudge says that they hope to catch Black before he rejoins You-Know-Who.
Madam Rosmerta is concerned about what she thinks Black has broken out to do.
